title: A Woman's Liberation: A Choice of Futures by and About Women
description: These ten classic stories, each featuring well-developed, strong female characters, have garnered numerous literary awards and span every style and theme in speculative fiction.Contents:Inertia / Nancy KressEven the Queen / Connie WillisFool's Errand / Sarah ZettelRachel in Love / Pat MurphyOf Mist, and Grass, and Sand / Vonda N. McIntyreThe July Ward / Sharon N. Farber (as S.N. Dyer)The Kidnapping of Baroness 5 / Katherine MacLeanSpeech Sounds / Octavia E. ButlerThe Ship Who Mourned / Anne McCaffreyA Woman's Liberation / Ursula K. Le Guin
author: Connie Willis
